name: Interstate Refrigerant Recovery, Inc.
materials: Large Household Appliances; Computer (Recycling); Computer Monitors; Electronics; Laptop Computers; Computer Peripherals; Small Electronics; Small Televisions; Televisions; Video Game Consoles; PlayStation Consoles
notes:
Interstate Refrigerant Recovery, Inc. (IRRI), is a leading provider of refrigerant recovery and recycling services, a member of SWANA, NFIB, Connecticut Recycler Coalitions and other environmental organizations, works with municipal, commercial, industrial, governmental and residential customers. 

We are a fully licensed and insured company that is registered with the United States Environmental Protection Agency and provides on-site service to safely and quickly recover all CFC's, in compliance with all regulations, from any freon bearing equipment you may have. A certification sticker will be affixed to each unit, and all units that have undergone the recovery process will be marked with an easily identifiable painted stripe. You will then be issued an EPA certification document to be kept on file.
